problem_text_cn: 如图,矩形ABCD中,AB=4,BC=2,点M在BC上,连接AM,作∠AMN=∠AMB,点N在直线AD上,MN交CD于点E,则BM•AN的最大值是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in the rectangle ABCD, AB = N_0, BC = N_1, point M is on BC, connect AM to make ∠AMN = ∠AMB, point N is on the straight line AD, MN intersects CD at point E, then the maximum value of BM•AN is ()
raw_answer: 解:作NH⊥AM于点H,如右图所示,则∠NHM=90°,∵在矩形ABCD中,AB=4,BC=2,点M在BC上,∠AMN=∠AMB,∴AC=2√{5},AD∥BC,∴∠DAM=∠AMB,∴∠DAM=∠AMN,∴△AMN是等腰三角形,∴AN=MN,AH=MH,∵∠ABM=∠NHM=90°,∠AMB=∠NMH,∴△ABM∽△NHM,∴\frac{BM}{HM}=\frac{AM}{MN},∴BM•MN=AM•HM,∵点M在边BC上,AM=2HM,∴AM的最大值是AM=AC,此时AM=2√{5},∴BM•MN的最大值是:2√{5}\cdot√{5}=10,∵MN=AN,∴BM•AN的最大值是10,故选:B．
